description: The throw-on fleece that'll replace your favorite sweatshirt, our Microchill™ Hoody is perfect for temps that sway more cool than cold and destinations that sway more fun-core than hardcore. Made from 100% brushed recycled polyester, it wicks away sweat when roasting by the campfire and keeps you warm when searching for tidepools on the northern California coast. The hood and kangaroo pocket combo is so classic, you could easily wear it every day—and since you'll want to, better make sure you have a bunch.
name: Mountain Hardwear Microchill Hoody - Mens
